metadata.title: CVE-2017-8933 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Libmenu-cache 1.0.2 insecurely uses /tmp for a socket file, allowing alocal user to cause a denial of service (menu unavailability).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8933` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmenu-cache-bin - 0.5.1-1ubuntu1.1
libmenu-cache3 - 0.5.1-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: menu-cache package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.1-1ubuntu1.1').
